name: Acteon
description:
Acteon is a Hack N Slash game made by nine French students.

Our goal was to create a professional playable demo of an AAA Hack N Slash.

You're playing a golem from an ancient civilisation who've been woken up by barbarians. These people are looting and destroying your villages.

Programmer :    

Alix Besson (LinkedIn),  Basile Vieu (LinkedIn),

Isaac Montagne (LinkedIn), Sidney Lentzy (LinkedIn).

Graphic Designer :

Antoine Rifaux (LinkedIn), Cloé Perret (LinkedIn),

Matthieu Corcuff (LinkedIn), Steve Henry (LinkedIn).

Sound Designer : 

Antoine Goumain (LinkedIn),

Language : English (but made by nine french baguettes)
